description: The Avantree HD160 Windscreen Car Holder compatible with smartphone, GPS device and more. Its super strong suction cup to keep stable, as well as easy installation and dismantlement. It allows fully adjustable with 360 degree rotation for portrait and landscape views.

features: * Universal compatibility - iPhone, Samsung, HTC and more. * Fully adjustable with 360 degree rotation. * Easy to install and remove on vehicles windscreen. * Gooseneck allows you to select any angle you would like. * Super strong suction cup for stability use.
